Damn, I found the source of one bug and discovered another one in the 
process dealing with grid names. :-( Unfortunately, that means the 
version I sent to Snowstorm has the 2nd bug in it.  Fortunately, both 
of those problems can be easily solved, but probably not before Friday 
 night.  The first problem can be solved by creating a global array 
and the second by string manipulation. :-)

Interesting trivia: Yesterday was the one year anniversary of me 
starting visits to a chiropractor.
